<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Semblance of Life](/Feats.aspx?ID=3522) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 52</row>

**Archetype** [Mummy](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=180)

**Prerequisites**
[Mummy Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3520)

**Trigger**
You deal damage to a living creature with your fist Strike or with [Desiccating Inhalation.](/Feats.aspx?ID=3530)

</column>

---

You draw the moisture you've drained from others into your own flesh, temporarily taking on the appearance of life. This has the effects of [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), except you can appear only as yourself while you were a living humanoid.
name: Semblance of Life
